page.title: 08Local Govts.S'key&C'thorpe.
page.content: {Parish boundaries:}Parish of Stiffkey includes Stiffkey salt marshes; Cockthorpe is in Parish of Binham. { {Stiffkey Parish Council:}7 councillors (now 1 woman, 6 men) elected every 4 years; employs clerk. Meets monthly in Village Hall to hear and act on matters of general welfare and to remedy complaints e.g.failure of street lights, deterioration of road surface, silting up of river, new bus shelters, new street signs, bridges on marsh. Called on by North Norfolk District Council to comment on planning applications in parish. { {Protection of ancient rights of {villagers:}Council's concern includes: rights of way, foot-paths, common land, ancient rights on Stiffkey marshes.
